name: HepatitisCVirusInfectionCombinationTestsThatIncludeHepatitisCVirusNucleicAcid
title: Hepatitis C Virus Infection (Combination Tests that include hepatitis C virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of hepatitis C virus Nucleic Acid in combination with at least one other organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: hepatitis C virus Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

HIV 1 RNA+HIV 2 RNA+Hepatitis C virus RNA+Hepatitis B virus DNA [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood from Donor by NAA with probe detection
